评论详情: I wore this dress in the Rose Gold color to my daughter’s wedding.  She picked it out for me.  It was beautiful!  It fit so well, very comfortable, looked so pretty and made me feel beautiful.  The quality was top notch.  It was stretchy enough for movement and comfort and the material and lining was made well enough that I didn’t need to wear a slip.  I’m so happy with this dress and happy that my daughter chose it.

I don’t need formal attire very often so I did not want to pay $500 for a dress. This was an amazing value and I felt great when I wore it. The jacket is just ok but still nice (you can substitute a shawl or just wear the dress). The sequins did not fall off. True to size (medium) and very flattering. I bought a top from the same manufacturer and was equally pleased. In total, less the $100 for both!

I wore this dress to a wedding and got many compliments on it. It was dressy, fit very well, and I felt pretty wearing it.  As other reviewers have noted, the sequins started to come off. One other thing, is that the shrug was very wrinkly when I got it and it took some doing to get the wrinkles out. I believe that’s very good value for the money. The zipper was very easy to use, and the item is good quality.

I loved this dress - the fit was really nice, and the length was great (5'3" fell just at the knee).  It had just the right amount of sparkle and the option of the light cover was spot on.  Sadly, I had to return it as the gold was more of a champagne gold, not the more metallic bright gold I needed (specified for a themed party).  Still wanted to keep it, but I don't think I would have any occasion to wear it.  I would definitely recommend if you are looking for this type of dress.
Comfortable and elegant. Great color selections. I was pleased with the quality of the material.

The Good:  it is a beautiful dress although the “jacket” (for lack of a better word) is next to nothing.  The zipper seemed to stick at first, but I was able to get it down eventually. I usually don’t have THAT problem!The  Bad: I sized up from what I normally wear, and it was still too small.  Skinniest size 10 I’ve ever seen!  But then I knew I would need to loose some weight for my son’s wedding. Still…

This dress is absolutely gorgeous. I read all of the reviews. Mine came in a plastic bag NOT vacuum sealed. No wrinkles in the dress or very light weight jacket. I put it on and it felt like it was made for me. I got the rose gold which actually looks peachy. I am 5'3 and 122 pounds. Ordered medium. Never thought I would by a dress from Amazon especially as a mother of the bride. Love it

评论概述: Dress is great but the jacket isn't same color
评论详情: The dress looked and fitted great.  The only issue I had was that the jacket wasn't the same color as dress like the picture showed.  The dress is burgundy color but the jacket was red

I bought this dress for my niece's wedding. I dress casual no matter the occasion.  I was invited to a formal wedding, and had no idea what to wear.  After searching online for 2 weeks, I seen hundreds of dresses.  On the last day ṭo order and receive before the big day, I chose this dress.  It fit perfect, it forms to your body comfortably and smooths fatty areas (Lol). I was very nervous and felt out of place ( this is only the 2 dress worn in my adult life). I arrived at the venue and several of the other guests complimented on how beautiful the dress is. Even though I'll probably never wear it again, it will hang in my closet forever. Material is stretchy and lightweight.

评论概述: Nice dress, a few light weight cautions
评论详情: Arrives in a compressed air plastic bag, so there are wrinkles. Don't country on "ready to wear". Steaming didn't seem to work. It needs a low, low heat iron, with A DAMP PRESSING CLOTH between the garment and the iron.  You don't want to melt the sequins.  Purchased in the darker grey, and the jacket appear almost violet in some light, but is the appropriate grey in other light. It just depends. Fits true to size.  It is lovely, will wear for New Year's Eve Party.

The dress is really nice. Good quality w/zipper in the back. The second piece that I’ll call the jacket for lack of a better word, gets easily wrinkled. So it gives an overall frumpy look especially in front where it needs to be more slick in order to keep the tapered look desired. The material just tends to flop around the chest area w/out any real form. Other than that. It’s a good 4 stars
I wore this dress to a New Year Eve party and it looked very nice on me.  I am 5'7" and the length was perfect .
Packaging caused wrinkles and needed cool/warm ironing on the cover jacket.  Received lots of compliments on this outfit.  I'm slightly fuller figured.

评论概述: a few seqyins came off, but not enough to be noticed
评论详情: I love this dress, It fit nicely, and the over cape disguised some figure problems.

评论概述: It's RED, not burgundy like the pics
评论详情: Dress and jacket look pretty nice on me. I was hoping the color would be more like the photos, but it is quite red. Still good for a holiday party.

评论概述: Dress is great for wedding guest
评论详情: I like the dress it fit perfectly. I ordered a size medium. I ordered burgundy but I feel like it looks kind of red

Color is very pretty. Love how shiny it is. I’m 5’4” and this hit just below knee rather than above as shown on the model. 140lbs so ordered the large. I think I may be able to size down. Jacket is very cute from the front, I feel it’s a little boxy from the side and back. Sheer with matching sparkle on the sleeve cuffs. Purchased for a Mother of the Groom dress. Undecided whether I will wear for the wedding or not, but keeping it anyway as I like it so much and the price is definitely right! Much less expensive than other dresses of similar quality. Has a little stretch and is much more comfortable than other dresses with sequins. Not itchy or scratchy at all as it is fully lined.
Loved the dress. Fit was great but returned because I found out the intended event was not as dressy.
Beautiful dress, too small for me
Bought to wear as mother of the groom dress.  A-line style, flattering on most.  I'm 5'11" and size 16 - dress length just above the knee.  It was comfy all night.
Took me 6 months to find the perfect dress for daughter’s wedding! Love this
Fits to size. Looks nice and like the pictures.
This dress is literally beautiful, I had to return it because it was the wrong color It came wrinkled, that is why it only got 4 stars But the color and fit were great
Thanks
I liked the dress but wasn’t crazy about the shape of the little jacket

I bought the burgundy sequin dress in XL. I usually wear a 14 dress as I'm about 5'4"+ and 160 lbs with a large chest (40D). The XL was fairly roomy and there is some stretch to the fabric. The dress is comfortable except for under the arms. Without the jacket on, the sequins scratch my sensitive skin on the arms. The length of the dress is just right, falling just at my knee. The jacket is very nice-- fairly sheer but adds a good look and a bit of warmth. The sequins on the cuffs of the jacket are a perfect touch. The jacket even has darts for shaping. I wish I could buy the jacket by itself! The zipper works very smoothly and I could zip it myself because there is enough stretch. The pattern of the sequins is quite pretty. If the lining fabric was a bit stiffer or thicker I think it would be more smoothing for lumpy bodies. My photos were taken without any fancy under garments. I would recommend something smoothing underneath if you're shaped like me.

评论概述: A todos les gusto mi vestido
评论详情: Muy elegante cómo

It was beautiful! My mother-in-law is religious and she needs to be modest. I got this for her to wear to my wedding. It traveled well, was modest, and light enough for her to wear in the Dominican Republic. It was definitely thinner than I thought, she had to wear a slip. But I would definitely buy again
Bought for my mother. She loved it. The green color was a beautiful shade. The material did not feel cheap.
Very elegant . Material is good.

This is a beautiful well made outfit. I purchased it for my son’s wedding in April “24”. I bought the silver because I felt it looked sophisticated but not too over the top. I am very pleased with this dress and jacket.  The dress fits beautifully and is filled with small sequins. It actually hides my flaws. I purchased a medium and a large and found the large to be the better fit. I like looser comfortable clothes so my purchases are based on the comfy fit.  The jacket is a very light weight sheer material with 3/4 sleeve with matching dress pattern on the end. Very pretty.  The only con I see is the jacket color is not the same as the dress. You can actually see it in the pictures if you pinch your phone screen big. It still looks beautiful tho. I also bought a facintor hat that arrives tomorrow. I bought a silver one that is simple and elegant and will add a pretty touch for my son’s wedding. I am happy with my purchase. I would recommend this dress for the look and price point.  One last thing…I am 5”1 and weigh between 125 and 130. I have the dreaded belly that fluctuates in size from eating habits. I also have small back bulge. This dress hides your little flaws.

Exactly as advertised.  Beautiful!  I bought the size 2x and was not disappointed.  I’m 5’7” and dress hit me above the knees.  I weigh 160 lbs and this dress hid my enlarged torso.  Love this dress.  Wore it to a Christmas Party.  Perfect for the holidays.
The product was good quality.
Like the style and how off conforms to the body.  Very wrinkled on arrival.  Has to steam wrinkles out of jacket. No harm done

评论概述: comfortable and pretty without the jacket
评论详情: Purchased for a Mother of the Bride dress.  The dress itself was comfortable and had plenty of stretch,. It was also lined and required no special undergarments.  I ordered up a size so it wouldn't be clingy. The jacket really wasn't my style so I ordered an inexpensive chiffon shawl to wear with it.There were a couple of times that sequins would get hooked together near the hem, but it was easily fixed.  I also noticed a few sequins on the floor when I took it off,  but there were no noticeable bare spots where it lost them.

I felt comfortable in the dress on a hot-humid summer day when it was over 90 degrees outside. I ordered a 16. I am only five feet tall and 173 lbs. I am not very chesty and have a thick waist, but the dress was still flattering. I received several compliments on it at my niece's wedding.  It might be too casual for the mother-of-the-bride, but if you're a guest of a wedding and looking for comfort while dancing, you might be happy with this purchase. The jacket drapes nicely and helps hide things a little, but in this picture part of the jacket is tucked behind my brother so you get a fuller view of my stomach. I still wanted to post a picture even though I feel it does not do the dress justice. One more thing, I ordered a pink dress. In person the dress was more of a rose gold, especially the sequences. The sheer portion of the dress is a pinkish/light salmon which I loved. I wore rhinestone shoes and rhinestone earrings which looked lovely with the rose gold hue of this dress.
Great dress..I love the dress it's perfect !! The sequence on the dress looks perfect..great seller came in quick the dress
I have to admit, I had doubts on buying this dress due to how it would fit but it fit perfectly and definitely would recommend.
Dress was very comfortable, received many compliments.  Would buy agan
Fits great, followed the size chart and it is true to size! Very sparkly and comfortable!

评论概述: Elegant Dress at an affordable price
评论详情: Bought this for a wedding, but didn’t wear it. I still kept it because it looks so nice on. I plan to wear it for new years. The color is amazing and fits great even though I’m over sized.
Really loved the dress. Surprised with the great quality and fit.

We purchased this dress for my mother to wear to my wedding. She was comfortable, she felt good, she looked good, and it made her feel good too! Also, she’s 5’4, so it sat a little longer on her but it was just fine.
It was too small in  the shoulders and the sequins  were itchy. I couldn’t wear the dress.

评论详情: Dress was to short. Color was different
The dress is very pretty, true to size, and comfortable. Great value!

Beautiful sequin evening dress that fits true to size.  I also bought it in royal blue and it is also gorgeous.  I'm 5'2" and the length hits right at the knee...just slightly lower than what is pictured by who must be a taller model.
I’ve tried several dresses. My only son is getting married & I needed a beautiful dress. This is a M dark gray & I absolutely love it. It’s stunning, very soft, stretchy & comfortable.

The dress was itchy and the sequins bothered me.  Delivered as expected.
Very nice dress, came fast, is perfect for a wedding or an any event. True to size.
Nice to have a zipper in the back so my hairstyle will not be messed up.

评论概述: Unbelievable!!! So thrilled with this purchase
评论详情: We are going on a cruise in December and haven’t been on one in twenty years. Long gowns are a thing of the past; except for some guests. I wanted to get a few new dress for formal nights but without spending hundreds of dollars. This is stunning. Yes, the jacket has some wrinkles, but I’m  sure if I  hang it in a hot steamy bathroom, it would get the majority out. I’ll roll it up before packing. For this price, I don’t even need a jacket.

I am on the high end of the measurements for a XXL.  I was stressing about it being too small.  OMG! It couldn’t fit anymore perfect! If your measurements are spot on with the garment measurements it will fit.
This dress looks better in the picture. It's pretty plain. Keeping since it was cheap.
Bought this for my mom and she looked beautiful. Great quality need to size up, but other than that beautiful.

评论概述: Very elegant better than I though
评论详情: This is a beautiful dress just enough sparkle to be noticed. Love it

So let me start by saying I ordered 2 dresses one teal and one navy for a spring wedding in New York.  I loved them both. I ordered two-sizes. I ordered  them a little big so I can't comment in size. I can say this dress is classy and looks great and is so comfortable. I highly recommend this dress. I have worn it 2 times and both times I have washed it in the washing machine inside out. It washed so well! It stayed true to color and size. BUY IT!!!
It was nice
This is a pretty dress but I decided I wanted a brighter color for my son's wedding and that wasn't an option for this dress in my size. I also wasn't a huge fan of the pattern on the dress.
Looks so nice!!!
Really pretty! It's fits perfectly and is very flattering, elegant, flowing and comfortable.

Beautiful dress. It fits perfectly and is so comfortable. It would be nice if it was shipped differently though. They stuff it in a little package and the jacket is nothing but wrinkles.  I had to steam it before I could wear it.
I have this wonderful menopause belly but this dress is still flattering. I wish this exact dress came in something without sequins.  I would buy one in every color. 😉

Bought this dress and I have to say it is absolutely beauitful! The picture on Amazon does no justice. It is stunning!! I bought it to wear to two Weddings which I haven’t went to yet, one is this month and one in June. It fits perfect and looks stunning. I tried it on and took pictures of myself and posted them to Facebook everyone was saying what a beauitful dress!!! Some of my friends are asking me where did I get this dress from? They want one too I said of course Amazon! I have the matching silver shoes as well. They have different colors to choose from in this dress I choose the Silver. Will be ordering another one in the purple. Love this dress!!!

The jacket part of the dress arrived with a rip in the lower part of the back of it. After I noticed the rip, I looked at the packaging and saw that the packaging was not damaged. So it was already ripped before it was packaged and sent to me. I ordered this dress to wear to a wedding but I’ll look elsewhere now instead. I’m very disappointed in this purchase.

Love the color. Great material. Flattering stretch but hugs body nicely. Sophisticated without being matronly. I am 5’7” ~140#. The only downside is the arm holes are too tight. I would say I have average sized arms and it cut at the armpit.

This dress is fabulous!  So comfortable even with all the sequins on it.  It’s lined beautifully and soft on the body. This is a must buy! I ended up buying another in navy blue, it’s perfect for the holiday parties. Just beautiful

I got this dress in Navy for a special event and like that it can be worn with or without the jacket. The dress itself is really cute with nice soft, stretchy material and the length was just right (I'm 5'10" and got XL).
decent quality for price

评论概述: Great fit, high quality, light weight
评论详情: When I saw this dress on line I thought it was too good to be true, but I ordered it anyway, and I'm so glad I did. After trying on over a dozen dresses that cost much more, this will be the dress I wear to my daughter's wedding. So happy to have found a dress that fits well and is comfortable. I'm 190, 5.6 and the XL is just right.
Dress was perfect but the bright red jacket clashed with the dress.
I loved the fit and length. It was beautiful, and made me feel amazing.
This really fit nice! The sequence under the arms kind of irritated but other than that I loved it

I really did like this dress . Unfortunately it was too big and I will be returning it. It would be perfect for a wedding guest . The material was very soft and comfortable. The only problem I found was the zipper. Got stuck and was really hard to zip , I think that would be a continual problem.
Red is a beautiful color for the holidays and it fit to size.

I put it on hoping it would look as good as it did online.It looked fabulous.It is very expensive looking and I will look good at the evening.Wedding in Corpus Christi. Love the dress.  I ordered silver bit to honest it looks like it's silver sequins on a light lilac colored dress.

I love the dress but it does run a little large but that works for me.  Really, my only complaint is that it came in a clear plastic ziplock bag - it was stuffed in there and I really would have preferred it to arrive in better packaging that wasn't see through.
Nice comfortable classy outfit. I received lots of compliments. Quality dress. I would recommend

This dress is elegant and the color is stunning.  It fit perfectly for a pudgy girl and was very comfortable, even sitting down.  I felt like it hid all my bulges.  I ended up returning it as I'm losing weight so didn't want to have a dress that I never got to wear hanging in my closet.  But it was a beautiful dress, especially the color.
I really like Grace Karin clothing.  I love the styles and the way they fit me so perfectly, true to size and good quality.  This dress is very elegant and I can't wait to wear it out on the evening.
